sources.title: Xtro 3: Watch the Skies (1995) J. Marvin Campbell | Horror, Sci-Fi Movie, Subtitles
sources.description:
From beyond imagination... from beyond the earth itself... XTRO waits.  Marines travel to a deserted island to diffuse bombs, only to be terrorized by a deadly alien creature.

Director: Harry Bromley Davenport
Writer: Daryl Haney
Stars: J. Marvin Campbell, Douglas Cavanaugh, Robert Culp
Genres: Action, Alien, Military, Horror, Sci-Fi

This movie is available with subtitles in more than 30 languages. Make your choice in the video settings ⚙️

metadata.Plot: Marines travel to a deserted island to defuse bombs, only to be terrorized by a deadly alien creature.
